hr.fer.zemris.java.tecaj.hw2

Class ComplexNumber

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.fer.zemris.java.tecaj.hw2.ComplexNumber

  • public class ComplexNumber
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents an unmodifiable complex number and offers basic operations over complex numbers. It offers a constructor as well as 4 static factory methods for creating instances of it.
    Author:
    Dan

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ComplexNumber(double real, double imaginary)
      Creates a complex number with given arguments.

      static ComplexNumber fromImaginary(double imaginary)
      Creates a complex number without real part (real(z) = 0).

      Creates a complex number with given polar coordinates.

      Creates a complex number without imaginary part (img(z) = 0).

      • parse

        public static ComplexNumber parse(java.lang.String s)
        Converts a string to a complex number. Valid input is for example "2.3 - 3i", any part (real or imaginary) can be omitted.
        Parameters:
        s - string to parse
        Returns:
        a complex number
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if given string does not contain a valid complex number format
